topic.title: User Home
topic.section: Once a user has logged in, a User Home link appears in the top navigation bar. Clicking this link will display different information depending on whether the user is visiting a specific conference or the site as a whole.

If the user has logged in and is browsing the main site, the following information is displayed:

My Conferences. The user will find a list of all conferences for which he/she has registered, along with links to all roles he/she performs for each conference. If the user is also the Site Administrator, there will also be links to site-wide administration pages.

My Account. The user will find options to manage user account, including editing the user's profile, changing the user's password, and logging out.
If the user has logged in and is browsing the specific conference, only information relevant to that conference is displayed.
